message.playerworlds.world_create.succes: Your world got successfully created, you can now visit it with the <color:#3fd9ff>/world home <color:#98f9ff>command!
message.playerworlds.world_delete.too_of: <color:#ff816a>You can't delete your world that often!
message.playerworlds.world_delete.warnin: Are you sure that you want to delete your world? It can't be rolled back even with all might and determination! Type <color:#3fd9ff>/world delete CONFIRM <color:#98f9ff>to continue.
message.playerworlds.force.delete.fail: <color:#ff816a>%player:displayname% does not have a world yet!
message.playerworlds.force.visit.fail: <color:#ff816a>%player% does not have a world yet!
message.playerworlds.hub_pos_change: Position of the Hub got changed to <color:#3fd9ff>%pos%
message.playerworlds.world_visit.fail: You are already on the <color:#3fd9ff>%owner%<color:#98f9ff>'s world!
message.playerworlds.invite_member.alrea: This player is already member of your world!
You have already invited this player!
message.playerworlds.invite_member.succe: <color:#3fd9ff>%newcomer% <color:#98f9ff>got successfully invited! They got 5 minutes to accept your invite.
message.playerworlds.invite_member.invit: <run_cmd:'/world accept %inviter%'><hover:'Click here to accept this invite or type <color:#98f9ff>/world accept %inviter% <r>command.'><underline>Click here to accept this invite.
message.playerworlds.accept.no_world: This player does not have a world yet.
message.playerworlds.accept.fail: This player did not invite you.
message.playerworlds.accept.success: You successfully accepted <color:#3fd9ff>%owner%<color:#98f9ff>'s invite! You can now visit the world with <color:#3fd9ff>/world home %owner% <color:#98f9ff>command.
message.playerworlds.remove_member.not_m: This player is not member of your world.
message.playerworlds.kick_visitor.member: You can't kick members of your world.
message.playerworlds.ban_player.member: You can't ban member of your world.
message.playerworlds.ban_player.ban: <color:#ff816a>You have been banned from visiting <color:#de4848>%owner%<color:#ff816a>'s world!
message.playerworlds.visit_home.not_memb: You are not member of this world.
message.playerworlds.visit_home.no_world: <color:#ff816a>This player doesn't have a world yet!
message.playerworlds.visit_home.fail: You are already on the <color:#3fd9ff>%owner%<color:#98f9ff>'s world!
message.playerworlds.home.fail: You are already on your world!
message.playerworlds.settings.lock: Your world is now closed for visitors!
message.playerworlds.settings.unlock: Your world can now be visited!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.bl: You can't break blocks out here!
You can't place blocks out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.bu: You can't use bucket out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.bo: You can't use bone meal out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.ax: You can't modify blocks out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.ba: You can't open barrels out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.ch: You can't open chests out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.it: You can't place items out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.do: You can't interact with doors out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.fa: You can't spoil farmlands out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.fe: You can't interact with fence gates out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.fl: You can't place fire out here!
You can't interact with flower pots out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.fu: You can't open furnaces out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.ho: You can't modify blocks out here!
You can't open hoppers out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.it: You can't interact with entities out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.en: You can't damage entities out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.da: You can't take damage out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.sh: You can't modify blocks out here!
You can't open shulker boxes out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.mi: You can't interact with entities out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.vi: You can't interact with entities out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.re: You can't interact with redstone out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.bo: You can't interact with entities out here!
message.playerworlds.world_protection.ar: You can't interact with entities out here!
message.playerworlds.help.4: - <color:#98f9ff>/world home <player> <r>→ Teleport to the world you are member of.
message.playerworlds.help.5: - <color:#98f9ff>/world members invite <player> <r>→ Invite player to your world.
message.playerworlds.help.6: - <color:#98f9ff>/world members remove <player> <r>→ Remove player from your world.
message.playerworlds.help.7: - <color:#98f9ff>/world accept <player> <r>→ Accept world join invite request.
message.playerworlds.help.8: - <color:#98f9ff>/world kick <player> <r>→ Kick player from your world.
message.playerworlds.help.9: - <color:#98f9ff>/world ban <player> <r>→ Ban player from visiting your world.
message.playerworlds.help.10: - <color:#98f9ff>/world unban <player> <r>→ Unban player to allow visiting your world.
message.playerworlds.help.14: - <color:#98f9ff>/world settings toggle-visits <r>→ Enables/disables ability to visit your world.
